docs.text: Welcome to Redkill tech We are working on a bunch of interesting projects which will make pre-silicon hardware testing faster & reduce the go to market time for custom silicn companies. Products in pipeline devos - an SMP kernel with aarch64 & risc-v support. multi-threaded preemptive virtual memory support modular build system lightning fast boot time And many more...
